name: Bow Knight Drifter - Ludum Dare 52
description:
Play as a knight that drifts through this strange island. Pick up flowers to craft arrows, hunt animals for their skins and claws to unlock new bows. When you are ready kill the Elder Dragon!

**Controls**  

Move: WASD  

Melee Attack: Left Mouse Button  

Bow Attack: Right Mouse Button  

Weapon Wheel: Tab (hold)  

Dash: Space  

Sprint: Shift  

Pickup Flowers: E  

 Heal: Z

  

Craft arrows/potions with Left Mouse Button when Weapon wheel is open  

Leave weapon wheel when weapon is select it to equip bow skill
